statements: SELECT * FROM food_reports ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT region, quantity FROM food_reports WHERE food_type='Fruit'
SELECT region, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM food_reports GROUP BY region
SELECT * FROM food_reports WHERE date_reported BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT food_type, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM food_reports GROUP BY food_type ORDER BY total_reports DESC
SELECT * FROM food_reports WHERE region = 'East' ORDER BY date_reported DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT food_type, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM food_reports GROUP BY food_type ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT region, COUNT(*) AS total_reports FROM food_reports WHERE date_reported BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY region ORDER BY total_reports DESC
SELECT * FROM food_reports WHERE quantity > 100 AND region = 'West' ORDER BY date_reported ASC
SELECT DISTINCT region FROM food_reports ORDER BY region
SELECT * FROM regions;
SELECT region_name, region_description FROM regions;
SELECT food_name, available_quantity FROM food_availability;
SELECT region_name, food_name, available_quantity FROM regions JOIN food_availability ON regions.region_id = food_availability.region_id;
SELECT region_name, food_name, available_quantity FROM regions JOIN food_availability ON regions.region_id = food_availability.region_id WHERE available_quantity > 0;
SELECT region_name, region_description FROM regions ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT food_name, available_quantity FROM food_availability WHERE available_quantity > 100 ORDER BY food_name ASC;
SELECT region_name, region_description, food_name FROM regions JOIN food_availability ON regions.region_id = food_availability.region_id WHERE available_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT region_name, region_description, food_name, available_quantity FROM regions JOIN food_availability ON regions.region_id = food_availability.region_id WHERE region_name = 'Asia';

SELECT region_name, COUNT(food_id) AS total_foods FROM regions LEFT JOIN food_availability ON regions.region_id = food_availability.region_id GROUP BY region_name HAVING total_foods > 3 ORDER BY total_foods DESC;
SELECT * FROM FoodAvailability;
SELECT region_id, food_item, quantity FROM FoodAvailability WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT region_name, country, population FROM Regions ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT * FROM Reports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT report_id, region_id, report_date FROM Reports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT region_name, country, population FROM Regions
SELECT food_item, quantity, last_updated FROM FoodAvailability
SELECT report_date, report_text FROM Reports WHERE region_id = 1
SELECT * FROM FoodAvailability ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT region_name, country, population FROM Regions WHERE population > 100000
SELECT * FROM Region;
SELECT region_name FROM Region WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT item_name, available_quantity FROM Food_Item JOIN Availability ON Food_Item.item_id = Availability.item_id WHERE region_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Availability WHERE available_quantity > 100;
SELECT report_date, report_details FROM Reports WHERE region_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Region;
SELECT item_name, available_quantity FROM Food_Item JOIN Availability ON Food_Item.item_id = Availability.item_id;
SELECT region_name, report_date FROM Region JOIN Reports ON Region.region_id = Reports.region_id;
SELECT DISTINCT region_name FROM Region ORDER BY region_name DESC;

SELECT item_name, available_quantity, region_name FROM Food_Item JOIN Availability ON Food_Item.item_id = Availability.item_id JOIN Region ON Availability.region_id = Region.region_id WHERE available_quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM region;
SELECT id, category_name FROM food_category;
SELECT id, region_id, category_id, availability FROM food_availability ORDER BY availability DESC;
SELECT report_text, report_date FROM report WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT decision_text FROM decision ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM region ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, category_name FROM food_category WHERE category_name LIKE 'Vegetables%';
SELECT region_id, SUM(availability) AS total_availability FROM food_availability GROUP BY region_id;
SELECT * FROM report WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT report_id, decision_text FROM decision ORDER BY decision_date ASC;
